title: Topic 001 Question 492
body: An application team is developing an internal application in its AWS account. Employees will use the application to access their employee benefits information. The application has an Amazon S3 bucket that is encrypted with an AWS Key Management Service (AWS KMS) customer managed key. The application team has configured an S3 gateway VPC endpoint for the application to use.

During testing, an IAM user is unable to download objects from the S3 bucket by using the AWS Management Console. However, other IAM users in the same AWS account can download objects from the S3 bucket.
Which policies or ACL should a security engineer review and modify to resolve this issue? (Choose three.)
options: The KMS customer managed key policy.
